title: Kwiatkowski Wins on Spain’s White Roads After Unlucky McNulty Punctures Late
content:
Kwiatkowski hangs at Jaén Paraíso after McNulty suffered a bad-luck puncture with 15km to go on the white roads across Spain's 'Mar de Olivos'

Read the full article at Kwiatkowski Wins on Spain’s White Roads After Unlucky McNulty Punctures Late on Velo.
author: ahood
